content: from crazy u.s.a….let me tell you something… you got it right lady. as sick as trump is, 8 years of ‘1984’ with hillary who believed in nothing but being the first woman president & going shopping…and war to prove she’s actually got balls…you’re right. much worse than 4 of trump. why? because she continues the bs of the brainwashed establishment. now at least, we’re forced to think for ourselves. pray for all the hilbot nuts we still have walking around like lost zombies. i think trump is disillusioning even his supporters…but the hilbots? they have the koolaid in their veins. anyway, glad to meet someone who thinks straight. keep it up. your article is shared.
